    Emitter Class

    Extends RootEmitter
    Defined in: src/index.js:83

    An OCF generic emitter that supports plugins and forwards events to a global emitter.

    onAny

    (
    • callback
    )

    Inherited from RootEmitter: src/index.js:62

    Listen for any event on this object and fire a callback when it's emitted

    Parameters:

    • callback Function

      The function to run when any event is emitted. First parameter is the event name and second is the payload.
